kop warthawa: nirdesha paridi ‘sewaka arthasadhaka aramudala’ pilibanda parikshanayak waha pawathwiya yuthuya 2015 pebarawariye sita 2016 mayi dakwa maha bankuwe bandumkara wancha sambandhayen soya balu kop warthawa, wenath nirdeshayanta amatharawa, ‘sewaka artha sadhaka aramudalata’ adala itha barapathala nirdeshayak idiripath kota thibe. 2010 sita 2016 mayi masaya dakwa ‘sewaka arthasadhaka aramudale’ ka්riyakarithwayata adalawa sidu wi athi bawak penena aayojana aka්ramikatha, nohobina kam, awakal ka්riya saha ehi samajikayanta athkara di athi padu sambandhayen waha parikshanayak pawathwiya yuthu bawa, kop kamitu pa්radhana warthawe menma, pada satahan sahitha wisammuthika warthaweda eka se nirdesha kota thibe.
